mapper.select: SELECT p_value, COUNT(*) AS count FROM pet GROUP BY p_value
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Pet (p_idx, p_name, p_value, p_breed, p_birthday, p_gender, p_serialNum, p_photo, m_idx) VALUES (#{p_idx}, #{p_name}, #{p_value}, #{p_breed}, #{p_birthday}, #{p_gender}, #{p_serialNum}, #{p_photo}, #{m_idx})
mapper.update: UPDATE Pet SET p_name = #{p_name}, p_value = #{p_value}, p_breed = #{p_breed}, p_birthday = #{p_birthday}, p_gender = #{p_gender}, p_serialNum = #{p_serialNum}, p_photo = #{p_photo} WHERE p_idx = #{p_idx}
